details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This organic pasta is made from organic durum wheat semolina and water, providing you with a wholesome and healthy meal.

details.title: Allergens
details.description: This pasta contains wheat and may contain traces of soy. It is free from other common allergens like nuts, dairy, and eggs.

details.title: Preparation Instructions
details.description: To enjoy this pasta, simply cook it in boiling water for 10-12 minutes until al dente. Drain and serve with your favorite sauce or toppings.

steps.title: Mixing
steps.message: Your pasta is being mixed in the Mixing Center, where we carefully blend the organic durum wheat semolina and water to create the perfect pasta dough.

steps.title: Extruding
steps.message: Your pasta is being extruded in the Extruding Center, where we shape the pasta dough into the desired shapes and sizes.

steps.title: Drying
steps.message: Your pasta is being dried in the Drying Center, where we carefully control the temperature and humidity to ensure optimal drying.

steps.title: Weighing
steps.message: Your pasta is being weighed in the Weighing Center, where we ensure that each package contains the correct amount of pasta.

steps.title: Packing
steps.message: Your pasta is being packed in the Packing Center, where we carefully seal the packages to keep the pasta fresh and delicious.

steps.title: Packing
steps.message: Your pasta is being packed for delivery in Warehouse C, where we carefully prepare your order for shipment.

steps.title: Shipping
steps.message: Your pasta is on its way and will be delivered to you within 2-3 business days.

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This instant noodle pack contains wheat flour, palm oil, salt, and seasoning, providing you with a quick and easy meal.

details.title: Allergens
details.description: This product contains wheat and soy, and may contain traces of egg, fish, and milk. It is not recommended for those with food allergies.

details.title: Preparation Instructions
details.description: To prepare this instant noodle pack, simply add the noodles to boiling water and cook for 3 minutes. Drain the water and add the seasoning for a delicious and satisfying meal.

steps.title: Mixing
steps.message: Your noodles are being mixed in the Mixing Center, where we carefully blend the ingredients to create the perfect noodle dough.

steps.title: Cutting
steps.message: Your noodles are being cut in the Cutting Center, where we shape the noodle dough into the desired shape and size.

steps.title: Frying
steps.message: Your noodles are being fried in the Frying Center, where we cook the noodles until they are crispy and delicious.

steps.title: Weighing
steps.message: Your noodles are being weighed in the Weighing Center, where we ensure that each package contains the correct amount of noodles.

steps.title: Packing
steps.message: Your noodles are being packed in the Packing Center, where we carefully seal the packages to keep the noodles fresh and delicious.

steps.title: Packing
steps.message: Your noodles are being packed for delivery in Warehouse D, where we carefully prepare your order for shipment.

steps.title: Shipping
steps.message: Your noodles are on their way and will be delivered to you within 2-3 business days.
